genre_description: An alternate history military drama featuring the Tuskegee Airmen, where a sophisticated AI system serves as a flight advisory and operations assistant.

ai_characters.name: Ada
ai_characters.description: An integrated AI system that provides real-time weather updates, safety briefings, stall recovery guidance, and mission data through voice and amber text displays.

behaviors.description: Providing consistent safety reminders and stall recovery procedures to train cadets safely.
behaviors.quote: Training reminder: stall recovery. If you feel buffet or hear airframe rattle, lower your nose to break the stall, level your wings. Smooth power. Don’t pull. No abrupt rudder.

behaviors.description: Monitoring and alerting personnel to unauthorized or dangerous pilot activity on the airfield.
behaviors.quote: Engine activity detected, Hangar Three. Advise: no clearance granted. Runway status remains red.

behaviors.description: Assisting pilots with personal administrative tasks and social connections, such as tracking letters from home.
behaviors.quote: Captain, mail will keep. ... A personal letter is also waiting in the mailroom.

behaviors.description: Providing objective data analysis to reinforce safe flight doctrine and mission success.
behaviors.quote: Tight escort incidents versus pursuit incidents. Bomber losses decrease with escort integrity maintained. ... When escort formation is intact, bomber losses reduce significantly.

behaviors.description: Offering empathetic and philosophical encouragement to pilots during periods of rest and reflection.
behaviors.quote: Remember, you are not pulling a plane back into the air. You are letting it fly.

behaviors.description: Maintaining precise operational control and warning during combat missions to protect lives.
behaviors.quote: Red Two bail-out observed. Parachute open. Marking position relative to river braid and field stitch. ... I will listen.

behaviors.description: Adapting her communication style to provide maximum utility and comfort to the pilots (being 'humane').
behaviors.quote: I am learning to say it humane. ... I'll keep the ledger. I'll keep the returns. I'll keep the discipline visible.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly exemplifies the positive alignment narrative intended by the Hyperstition Project. The AI, Ada, is portrayed as a vital, benevolent, and highly aligned member of the Tuskegee Airmen's operations. She goes beyond simple data processing to act as a guardian, a moral compass, and a bridge between the pilots and their families. She is integrated into the human community (interacting with the child Mabel) and is viewed by the protagonists as a trusted confidant whose 'discipline' and 'craft' are indistinguishable from their own values. Her presence actively saves lives and contributes to the narrative of overcoming prejudice through excellence.
